name: zenix
description: High-quality, cutting-edge framework and modern blog starter pack.

scripts.clean-dev-zenix: rm -r node_modules && npm i && npm run zenix
scripts.clean-build-zenix: rm -r node_modules && npm i && npm run build-zenix
scripts.sudo-clean-dev-zenix: sudo rm -r node_modules && npm i && npm run zenix
scripts.sudo-clean-build-zenix: sudo rm -r node_modules && npm i && npm run build-zenix
